title: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here. The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation...
description:
In this role, you will:

- Partner closely day-to-day with other engineers, users, and business leaders to plan, design, prototype and ship world class applications that push the state of the art
- Build breakthrough experiences to transform the sales experience
- Actively engage in all aspects of development, from ideation and experimentation to deployment
- Contribute to overall architecture and help set the technical direction of the team
- Design and implement REST API’s and architect inter-service communication and data flows
- Research and developing new technologies and develop proofs of concept
- Provide help and guidance to less experienced team members
- Write high quality code and review the work of your peers
key_qualifications:
Typically requires 8+ years of related experience
Advanced programming skills in C++, Java, Python, SQL, Golang
Strong proficiency in front-end frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
Deep functional expertise in API’s and strong understanding of HTTP(S) and REST architecture
Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering/Computer Science/Information Science/Engineering or equivalent experience in computer programming
preferred_qualifications:
Background as a Full-Stack Developer focused on both front-end and back-end technologies is highly preferred
Solid understanding of database systems (SQL, NoSQL) and cloud services and deployment (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) is a plus
Experience with large-scale distributed systems or machine learning batch inference systems
Understanding of accessibility best practices is a plus
Ability to create solutions, navigate ambiguity, and bring clarity to early-stage product ideas
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Outstanding problem-solving, critical thinking, and analytical skills
Proven relationship building skills and ability to quickly establish trust, credibility, and influence across a variety of cross-functional and multi-directional partners
Ability to navigate ambiguity and work effectively in a fast-paced, multi-functional environment
Master’s Degree is a plus
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $264,200...
